Package dbproject.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
dbproject.client.Client
public class Client extends Object
A client for a game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client(InetAddress host, int port) throws IOException
      Create a new instance of a client.
      Parameters:
      host - Host to connect to
      port - Port to connect to
      Throws:
      IOException - On connection issue.

  • Method Details

    • close

      public void close()
      Close the connection to the server.

    • addListener

      public void addListener(ClientListener listener)
      Adds a listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - Listener to add

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener(ClientListener listener)
      Removes a listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - Listener to remove

    • handleDisconnect

      public void handleDisconnect()
      Sends connection lost message to all listeners.

    • sendHello

      public void sendHello(String clientDescription)
      Sends hello message to server.
      Parameters:
      clientDescription - Description of client to send to server

    • sendLogin

      public void sendLogin(String newUsername)
      Sends login message to server and stores it in the client.
      Parameters:
      newUsername - Username to include with message.

    • sendUserListRequest

      public void sendUserListRequest()
      Sends user list request message to server.

    • sendQueueEntry

      public void sendQueueEntry()
      Sends queue entry request message to server.

    • sendMove

      public void sendMove(int location) throws IllegalMoveException
      Sends move to server if move is valid.
      Parameters:
      location - Location of move.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - If move is invalid or if it is not client's turn.

    • receiveHello

      public void receiveHello(String description)
      Passes hello message to listeners.
      Parameters:
      description - Description of server

    • receiveLoginConfirmation

      public void receiveLoginConfirmation()
      Passes login confirmation to listeners.

    • receiveAlreadyLoggedIn

      public void receiveAlreadyLoggedIn()
      Passes already logged in message to listeners.

    • receiveUserList

      public void receiveUserList(String[] users)
      Passes user list to listeners.
      Parameters:
      users - List of usernames connected to server.

    • receiveNewGame

      public void receiveNewGame(String player1, String player2)
      Passes new game message to listeners and starts new game. Asks for move if client is first to move.
      Parameters:
      player1 - Username of player 1
      player2 - Username of player 2

    • receiveMove

      public void receiveMove(int location)
      Passes move message to listeners and performs move on game. Asks for move if client is up.
      Parameters:
      location - Location of move.

    • receiveGameOver

      public void receiveGameOver(String reason, String winner)
      Pass game over message to listeners.
      Parameters:
      reason - Reason for winning, either Protocol.VICTORY, Protocol.DRAW, or Protocol.DISCONNECT
      winner - Username of winner, null if reason is Protocol.DRAW

    • receiveError

      public void receiveError()
      Pass an error message to listeners.

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer(Player player)
      Set the player used by the client.
      Parameters:
      player - Player to use

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
      Returns the copy of the game used by the client.
      Returns:
      the copy of the game used by the client

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      Returns the username of the client.
      Returns:
      the username of the client

    • getServerDescription

      public String getServerDescription()
      returns the server description the client is connected to.
      Returns:
      the server description

    • isLoggedIn

      public boolean isLoggedIn()
      Returns true if and only if client is logged in.
      Returns:
      True if and only if client is logged in
